Title: Bulb Jalega Boss
Actors: Gopal Dutt, Naveen Kasturia, Arunabh Kumar, Jitendra Kumar
Plot: Naveen, Mandal and Yogi pick up from where they left off to make it or break it at the event under any circumstance, while Jeetu has an agenda of his own to take care at home. The events unfold parallel to each other.
